1.name: Meeting hours
1.description: Meeting hours are from 11 to 17 Kyiv time

2.name: Being a professional
2.description: Best practice = professional approach + friendly atmosphere

4.name: E-mails & invitations
4.description: Check your e-mails at least once a day and send responses to invitations!

6.name: All-Hands and weekly meetings
6.description: Weekly meetings are for everyone + all-hands

7.name: Working hours
7.description: Came early? Write a [time] e-mail when leaving

8.name: Timeliness
8.description: Start, finish and come to the meetings on time

9.name: Strong language
9.description: Avoid using strong language at the office

10.name: Kitchen
10.description: Wash your dishes and clean the kitchen after yourself: tables, fridge and cupboards

11.name: Device tracker
11.description: Mandatory: reserve a device on the Device Tracker page

12.name: Turn off
12.description: Turn off a device before leaving it on the shelf when finished using it

13.name: Entertainment
13.description: Distractions & entertainment should not be parallel with work

14.name: Meetings are priority
14.description: Do not bother people at the meeting

15.name: Keeping to the point
15.description: Keep your discussions relevant (no non-related topics)

17.name: Noise
17.description: Reduce the noise level in the open space

18.name: Preparation
18.description: Prepare to the meetings and create them with a comprehensible agenda

19.name: Messengers
19.description: Check HipChat and other communication channels at least once a day

20.name: Sounds & music
20.description: Test the sounds only in headphones. Turn off the sound in the headphones when leaving your working place

21.name: Charge
21.description: Put a device on charge when leaving it in the cell

24.name: Respect & Politeness
24.description: Cleaning after yourself is a common courtesy

25.name: Private talks Vs. Work talks
25.description: Hold all telephone and private talks in the meeting rooms

26.name: Vacation
26.description: Going on vacation? Put it into semesterlistan in advance!

27.name: Bathrooms
27.description: Keep it clean. You know what we mean

29.name: Time tag
29.description: Late, leaving early or OOO? Yes. Write a [TIME] e-mail
